Active: Warwick briefly senses all enemies. The nearest sensed champion is Blood Hunted for 8 seconds. Cast only while not in combat with a champion.

While no enemies are being hunted, Blood Hunt cools down twice as fast.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c3.name: Blood Hunt
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c3.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

5a1386448bf55085c847d597.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
5a1386448bf55085c847d597.tooltip:
Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Azir and his allies can pass freely through Emperor's Divide.

Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.
5a1386448bf55085c847d597.name: Emperor's Divide

5a1386428bf55085c847d524.tooltip:
Passive: {{ e3 }}% of the Damage taken while this ability is not cooling down is converted to gray health. If allowed to decay, {{ e2 }}% of gray health will turn back into health.

Active: Convert all of your gray health into a shield that lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.
5a1386428bf55085c847d524.name: Thick Skin
5a1386428bf55085c847d524.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d25a.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25a.tooltip: Launches a bandage in a direction. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu pulls himself to them, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning for {{ e2 }} second.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25a.name: Bandage Toss

5a1385df8bf55085c847d193.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d193.tooltip: Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan spirals into the air, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking up enemies for {{ e3 }} second.

5a1386408bf55085c847d481.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack critically strikes.
5a1386408bf55085c847d481.tooltip:
Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage on her next basic attack within {{ e3 }} seconds.

Tumble's bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Vayne's total attack damage.
5a1386408bf55085c847d481.name: Tumble

5a13863f8bf55085c847d44c.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks restore {{ e1 }} Health.

Active: Irelia's basic attacks deal {{ e2 }} true damage and Hiten Style restores twice as much health for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44c.name: Hiten Style
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44c.description: Irelia is skilled in the art of Hiten, passively giving her physical attacks Health restoration. Activating Hiten Style doubles her Health restoration and gives her basic attacks true damage.

5a1386448bf55085c847d58e.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
5a1386448bf55085c847d58e.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second.

The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d204.tooltip: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d204.name: Power Fist
5a1385df8bf55085c847d204.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d424.tooltip:
Passive: Slam damage is increased by {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Active: Illaoi swings her idol, causing a Tentacle to Slam forward.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d424.name: Tentacle Smash
5a13863f8bf55085c847d424.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e9.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e9.tooltip:
Deal {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to a target. If the target is killed by Twin Fang, or is killed during its flight, Cassiopeia gains {{ cost }} Mana.

If the victim is Poisoned when Twin Fang hits, it takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and Cassiopeia heals for {{ f4 }} (+{{ f2 }}).
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e9.name: Twin Fang

5a1386408bf55085c847d479.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for {{ e3 }} second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.
5a1386408bf55085c847d479.name: Bear Stance
5a1386408bf55085c847d479.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.

5a1386428bf55085c847d51b.tooltip:
Cast once to create a wall. Recast immediately to ride ahead of the wall. Moving or receiving damage will cause Taliyah to stop.

Weaver's Wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. Deactivate this spell to break the wall early.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51b.name: Weaver's Wall
5a1386428bf55085c847d51b.description: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5e0.description: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy.  The shadow's spin slows.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e0.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but are slowed by {{ e3 }}% instead.

5a1386428bf55085c847d544.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
5a1386428bf55085c847d544.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of {{ e3 }} seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a9.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a9.tooltip:
Creates a cloud of Black Smoke lasting 4 seconds. Enemies inside Black Smoke cannot see out.

Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e2 }}% on impact.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4be.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4be.tooltip:
Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) true damage. For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional {{ e3 }}% damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f3 }}

If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, it may be re-cast at no cost within 20 seconds.

At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine unlocks - its cooldown resets entirely on kills and it no longer has a Mana cost.

5a1386428bf55085c847d51f.description: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51f.tooltip:
Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ e1 }} magic damage +{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's max health as magic damage to nearby enemies.

Absorbing Goo reduces Unstable Matter's cooldown by {{ e4 }} second.

Max health damage is capped at {{ e5 }} versus minions and monsters.

5a1386438bf55085c847d546.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Each enemy unit he touches takes damage and receives a Mark of the Storm.
5a1386438bf55085c847d546.tooltip:
Kennen doubles his base movement speed and ignores unit collision for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

Kennen gains 40 Energy the first time he passes through an enemy.

5a1386438bf55085c847d546.name: Lightning Rush

5a1386428bf55085c847d530.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
5a1386428bf55085c847d530.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Increases Boomerang Throw's cooldown reduction on catch to {{ e4 }}% and Hyper's Movement Speed bonus to {{ e2 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Knocks nearby enemies in the specified direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and slowing them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemies that hit a wall take {{ e7 }}% damage and are stunned instead of slowed.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b8.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b8.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

5a1386408bf55085c847d484.tooltip:
Vayne gains {{ e1 }} bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for {{ e2 }} seconds. The duration of Final Hour is extended by {{ e5 }} seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within {{ e6 }} seconds.

Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains {{ e4 }} movement speed.
Tumble: Vayne will also gain Invisibility for {{ e3 }} second when she Tumbles.

Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration.
5a1386408bf55085c847d484.name: Final Hour
5a1386408bf55085c847d484.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d43c.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43c.tooltip:
Active: Strikes an irresistible chord, stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for {{ e2 }} seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Passive: Reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities by {{ e3 }}%.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d43c.name: Crescendo

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b9.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b9.tooltip:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b9.name: Conflagration

5a13863f8bf55085c847d455.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d455.tooltip:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, gaining a brief haste and becoming untargetable while slowing enemies above him by {{ e3 }}%.

Vladimir deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health] magic damage over the duration and heals himself for {{ e5 }}% of that amount.

Sanguine Pool can be cast while charging Tides of Blood.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d455.name: Sanguine Pool

5a13863f8bf55085c847d449.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d449.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed and {{ e7 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d3.tooltip: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air and gains {{ e4 }}% decaying movement speed over {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d3.description: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d444.tooltip:
Yorick summons The Maiden of the Mist and {{ e1 }} Mist Walkers. The Maiden has {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health, deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths.

When Yorick damages the Maiden's target he will deal {{ e5 }}% of their max Health as bonus magic damage ({{ e7 }} second cooldown).

If the Maiden is summoned inside a lane, she will start pushing the lane.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d444.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d426.tooltip:
Illaoi pulls the spirit from an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds (reduced when Illaoi is attacked by the target). The spirit can be attacked, with {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f5 }}%) of the damage taken echoing to its owner.

If the spirit dies or the target leaves its range, the target becomes a Vessel for {{ e2 }} seconds and is slowed by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. Vessels spawn Tentacles every {{ f1 }} seconds if no other Tentacles are nearby.

Tentacles will automatically Slam at spirits and Vessels once every 10 seconds.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d426.name: Test of Spirit
5a13863f8bf55085c847d426.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a <font color='#669900'>Vessel</font> and begin spawning Tentacles.

5a1386408bf55085c847d482.tooltip:
Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than {{ e2 }}).

Silver Bolts deals no more than {{ e3 }} damage against monsters.
5a1386408bf55085c847d482.name: Silver Bolts
5a1386408bf55085c847d482.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)

5a1386428bf55085c847d521.description: Zac flattens himself, making him immune to crowd control while slowing enemies standing on top of him. When he decides to bounce away, he will suck up any enemies standing on top of him, taking them for a ride.
5a1386428bf55085c847d521.tooltip:
First cast: Zac squishes himself down, making him immune to Crowd Control for up to {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies standing on top of him are slowed by {{ e4 }}%.

Second cast: Charging for at least {{ f1 }} seconds before recasting causes Zac to scoop up enemies on top of him, carrying them towards a location. Upon landing nearby enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are briefly slowed.

Reactivating before Zac charges up knocks back nearby enemies instead.

5a1386428bf55085c847d51d.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51d.tooltip:
Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for {{ e4 }} second the first time they get hit.

At the start, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional {{ e3 }}% per second over the duration.

5a1386438bf55085c847d54c.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
5a1386438bf55085c847d54c.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e5 }} Mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.

Active: Creates an electric aura dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds to nearby enemies.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d44a.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44a.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants True Sight of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d59b.tooltip:
Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemy units by {{ e1 }}% and adding a stack every {{ e4 }} seconds. At {{ e5 }} stacks the target is stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Augment - Implosion: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.
5a1386448bf55085c847d59b.name: Gravity Field
5a1386448bf55085c847d59b.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

5a1386438bf55085c847d57a.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57a.tooltip:
Passive: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

In addition, his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e3 }}%.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57a.name: Stacked Deck

5a13865a8bf55085c847d60a.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60a.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through.

He generates {{ e4 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of {{ e0 }} Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for {{ e9 }} seconds. No longer generates Fury.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60a.name: Slice and Dice

5a1386438bf55085c847d553.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.

5a1386438bf55085c847d553.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d27e.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d27e.tooltip: Sejuani charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d27e.name: Arctic Assault

5a13863f8bf55085c847d463.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d463.tooltip:
Talon disperses a ring of blades that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all units they hit, gains {{ e3 }}% increased movement speed, and becomes Invisible for up to {{ e5 }} seconds. When the Invisibility ends, the blades converge, dealing the same damage again to enemies they pass through.

If Talon cancels Invisibility with an attack or Noxian Diplomacy, the blades converge on his target's location instead.

Stealth - Invisible: Talon can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d9.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0d9.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d16e.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d16e.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d16e.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite

5a1386408bf55085c847d4bf.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4bf.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each target hit. Both apply on-hit effects.

The second shot can critically strike for {{ f1 }}% damage, and it always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f2.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f2.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over {{ e9 }} seconds. This spell deals {{ e4 }}% damage to minions.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals {{ e5 }}% damage.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f2.name: Flamespitter

5a1386428bf55085c847d52e.description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
5a1386428bf55085c847d52e.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Every 3rd attack or spell on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of the target's max Health as magic damage and grants Gnar {{ f1 }}% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds (max {{ e4 }} damage vs. monsters).

Mega Gnar: Stuns enemies in an area for {{ e5 }} seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage.

Gnar gains Hyper's Movement Speed bonus when he leaves Mega form.

5a1386438bf55085c847d55e.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55e.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and are also immobilized. Immobilized units gain {{ e4 }} Blight stacks over the duration.

5a1386448bf55085c847d590.tooltip:
Sivir creates a magical barrier for {{ e1 }} seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains {{ e2 }} Mana.

5a1386448bf55085c847d590.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.

5a1386448bf55085c847d59e.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.

Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt the same damage again.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c2.tooltip:
Warwick lunges forward and bites his target. While the key is held down, he will attach to the target then leap behind them.

5a13864f8bf55085c847d5db.tooltip:

Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.

Mordekaiser deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone.

Talon vaults up to {{ f2 }} units over the nearest structure or terrain in the target direction. The vault's speed is affected by Talon's movement speed.

5a1386428bf55085c847d512.tooltip:

5a1386598bf55085c847d5fc.tooltip:

Akali flourishes her kamas, slicing enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Twitch becomes Camouflaged and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. This bonus triples when he is nearby an enemy champion that cannot see him.

Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.

At {{ e5 }} Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional {{ f3 }} magic damage and stun for {{ e6 }} second.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4fa.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit colision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d2a9.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell with such force that it knocks Graves back. The shell deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d245.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies farther away take two-thirds damage.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c9.description:

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c9.tooltip:

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e9.tooltip:
Talon leaps to target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If cast from melee range, Talon does not leap but instead critically strikes, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

5a1386408bf55085c847d47d.tooltip:

5a1386438bf55085c847d56e.tooltip:

Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

5a1386428bf55085c847d52d.tooltip:

The boomerang returns towards Gnar after hitting an enemy, dealing {{ e7 }}% damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its cooldown by {{ f1 }}%.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d279.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. The shots stop on the first champion hit, slowing it by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% health the target is missing (up to {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }})). Ferocity effect:

5a1385df8bf55085c847d19f.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of his maximum health) (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains movement speed that ramps up to {{ e5 }}% over 3 seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d26c.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magical damage upon impact and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magical damage each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d199.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d199.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her turn to stone and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

5a1386428bf55085c847d507.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d439.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ce.tooltip:

5a1385df8bf55085c847d202.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
