5a13863f8bf55085c847d44f.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44f.tooltip:
Releases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 30% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of {{ f1 }} damage to a single enemy.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44f.name: Fox-Fire

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1dd.description: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1dd.tooltip: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a long range missile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each enemy it passes through. Deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each enemy hit (minimum {{ e3 }}%).
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1dd.name: Trueshot Barrage

5a1386418bf55085c847d502.description: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
5a1386418bf55085c847d502.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: When Volibear has {{ e2 }} stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each {{ e7 }}% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%.
5a1386418bf55085c847d502.name: Frenzy

5a13865b8bf55085c847d610.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d610.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Places a bomb on an enemy or turret that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage. Each attack and ability charges the bomb's damage by +{{ e6 }}%.

At 4 charges, the bomb explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d610.name: Explosive Charge

5a1385df8bf55085c847d23a.tooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*4 }}) magic damage per second.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23a.name: Poison Trail
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23a.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5bd.tooltip:
For {{ e2 }} seconds Twitch gains {{ e5 }} Attack Range and {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage.

For the duration, his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal {{ e3 }}% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of {{ e4 }}% damage.

Stealth - Camouflage: Activating Spray and Pray does not end Camouflage.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5bd.name: Spray and Pray
5a1386448bf55085c847d5bd.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

5a1386428bf55085c847d522.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.
5a1386428bf55085c847d522.tooltip:
Damage the first enemy hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }}s. Champions with 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste will additionally be stunned for {{ e6 }}s.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour monsters/minions from a distance.
5a1386428bf55085c847d522.name: Tongue Lash

5a1386428bf55085c847d543.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
5a1386428bf55085c847d543.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.
5a1386428bf55085c847d543.name: Ebb and Flow

5a1385df8bf55085c847d216.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d216.tooltip: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d216.name: Aqua Prison

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c1.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c1.tooltip:
Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemy champions, filling up 20% of the Blood Well for each hit.

Aatrox gains {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e5 }} attack range for {{ e8 }} seconds upon cast.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c1.name: Massacre

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c4.description: Mordekaiser curses an enemy champion or the Dragon, stealing a percent of their life initially and each second. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c4.tooltip:
Passive - Dragon Force: Damaging the Dragon will Curse it for 10 seconds.

Active: Curse target Champion and steal {{ e1 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health (25% initially, 75% over 10 seconds; deals magic damage).

Curse Effect: When killed by Mordekaiser's team, the Cursed unit's soul will follow Mordekaiser for {{ e9 }} seconds. Mordekaiser gains {{ e7 }}% of their ability power and {{ e8 }}% of their bonus health. The ghost gains (+{{ f1 }}) attack damage and (+{{ f2 }}) health.

The ghost can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c4.name: Children of the Grave

5a1386438bf55085c847d582.description: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
5a1386438bf55085c847d582.tooltip:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) Magic Damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage by 25%, up to {{ e6 }}%.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.
5a1386438bf55085c847d582.name: Sweeping Blade

5a1386408bf55085c847d4ba.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4ba.tooltip:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow the target by {{ e4 }}%.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4ba.name: Pyroclasm

5a1386428bf55085c847d525.tooltip:
Begin to channel for up to 6 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location. Incoming champion damage breaks the channel.

'Boy, the world's one river, and I'm its king. Ain't no place I ain't been; ain't no place I can't go again.'
5a1386428bf55085c847d525.name: Abyssal Voyage
5a1386428bf55085c847d525.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.

5a1386428bf55085c847d513.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
5a1386428bf55085c847d513.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball, gaining up to {{ f2 }}% Movement Speed over {{ e4 }} seconds. On enemy collision, he stops, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Powerball on cooldown.
Powerball is a channeled spell and is subject to interruption by spells that prevent casting.
Casting Powerball cancels Defensive Ball Curl and puts it on cooldown.
5a1386428bf55085c847d513.name: Powerball

5a1385df8bf55085c847d218.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d218.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks, causing them to slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Lasts for {{ e5 }} seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d218.name: Tidecaller's Blessing

5a13863f8bf55085c847d42c.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42c.tooltip:
Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

While charging, Vi cannot be stopped and has True Sight of the target. Any enemies in the way are knocked aside and dealt 75% of the damage.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42c.name: Assault and Battery

5a13864e8bf55085c847d5d8.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
5a13864e8bf55085c847d5d8.tooltip: Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds. Galio will stop upon hitting a champion or terrain.
5a13864e8bf55085c847d5d8.name: Justice Punch

5a1386438bf55085c847d57f.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for {{ e2 }} seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57f.name: Move Quick
5a1386438bf55085c847d57f.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e3.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e3.tooltip:
First Cast: Poppy channels for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing herself by {{ e7 }}%.

Second Cast: Poppy smashes the ground, emanating a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies around the first champion hit and knocking them a large distance toward their Summoning Platform. The shockwave length and knockback distance increases with channel duration.

Enemies hit with an uncharged Keeper's Verdict will take half the damage and be knocked straight into the air for half the duration. Enemies are untargetable while they are being knocked away.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e3.name: Keeper's Verdict

5a1385de8bf55085c847d164.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d164.tooltip: Miss Fortune reveals an area, raining down bullets that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slow enemies hit by {{ e2 }}%.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d164.name: Make It Rain

5a1386568bf55085c847d5df.description: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5df.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to each additional enemy.

Additional shurikens that hit the same enemy deal 25% less damage than previous shurikens.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5df.name: Razor Shuriken

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fb.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fb.name: Frozen Domain
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fb.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a4.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a4.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals {{ e4 }}% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a4.name: Whirling Death

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d5.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d5.tooltip:
Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for {{ e1 }} seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. The Culling does {{ e8 }}% damage to minions.

Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.

Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d5.name: The Culling

5a1386448bf55085c847d59f.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.
5a1386448bf55085c847d59f.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward, the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}), and {{ e4 }}% of the Mana cost is refunded.
5a1386448bf55085c847d59f.name: Dredge Line

5a1386408bf55085c847d47c.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
5a1386408bf55085c847d47c.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.
5a1386408bf55085c847d47c.name: Demacian Standard

5a13863f8bf55085c847d44d.description: Irelia's attack balances the scales, dealing damage and slowing the target. However, if the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, then the blow stuns the target instead of slowing.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44d.tooltip:
Irelia pierces her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, she stuns them for the duration instead.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44d.name: Equilibrium Strike

5a13863f8bf55085c847d464.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d464.tooltip:
Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ f1 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

This spell can be cast while moving.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d464.name: Dark Sphere

5a13863f8bf55085c847d452.tooltip:
Passive: Continuously moving in one direction grants increasing Movement Speed up to {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Fly for {{ e3 }} units in the chosen direction. Only castable outside of combat. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.

Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing and reset the passive movement speed.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d452.name: Comet of Legend
5a13863f8bf55085c847d452.description: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d427.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d427.tooltip:
Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and spawning a Tentacle for each enemy champion hit.

For the next {{ e1 }} seconds Tentacles are untargetable and will Slam 50% faster, and Harsh Lesson has a 2 second cooldown.

'There are kind and gentle gods. Mine isn't one of those.'
5a13863f8bf55085c847d427.name: Leap of Faith

5a13865c8bf55085c847d618.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d618.tooltip: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d618.name: Valor

5a13863f8bf55085c847d44b.tooltip:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown is refreshed and Irelia gains {{ e2 }} Mana.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44b.name: Bladesurge
5a13863f8bf55085c847d44b.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds a portion of the Mana Cost.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c9.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c9.tooltip: Jinx fires a rocket that gains damage over the first second it travels. It explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Physical Damage plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's missing Health. Nearby enemies take 80% Damage.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c9.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!

5a13863f8bf55085c847d438.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d438.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for {{ e2 }} second.

Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d438.name: Body Slam

5a1385de8bf55085c847d170.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d170.name: Cocoon / Rappel
5a1385de8bf55085c847d170.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d136.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d136.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for {{ e5 }} second, take {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage, and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d136.name: Rupture

5a1386408bf55085c847d4aa.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4aa.tooltip:
Passive: Kog'Maw gains {{ e2 }}% bonus attack speed.

Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4aa.name: Caustic Spittle

5a13863f8bf55085c847d441.tooltip:
Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ e3 }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of their current health.

The Hextech Ultimatum ends if Camille leaves the area.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d441.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
5a13863f8bf55085c847d441.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d20d.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20d.tooltip: Malphite charges to target area. Upon his arrival he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d20d.name: Unstoppable Force

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c6.description: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c6.tooltip:
Fires arrows in a cone, each dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Enemies can block multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.

Champion hits count as Critical Strikes for the purposes of Frost Shot.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c6.name: Volley

5a13863f8bf55085c847d448.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d448.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e3 }} second(s).

An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of {{ f6 }} damage per cast.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d448.name: Glitterlance

5a1386428bf55085c847d541.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
5a1386428bf55085c847d541.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal from {{ f3 }} to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) additional magic damage, which builds up while not attacking (total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% total Attack Damage).

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind Thresh. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} second.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.
5a1386428bf55085c847d541.name: Flay

5a1386408bf55085c847d485.tooltip:
Passive: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush for {{ e1 }} seconds. For 3 seconds the area in and around the brush is revealed.
5a1386408bf55085c847d485.name: Brushmaker
5a1386408bf55085c847d485.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

5a1386408bf55085c847d478.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.
5a1386408bf55085c847d478.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e3 }}% of his maximum health), increasing by 1% for every percent of Udyr's missing health.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.
5a1386408bf55085c847d478.name: Turtle Stance

5a1385df8bf55085c847d274.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d274.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds and Leona will dash to them.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d274.name: Zenith Blade

5a13863f8bf55085c847d437.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d437.tooltip:
Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for {{ e5 }} seconds.

After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of their max Health (max {{ e4 }} vs monsters).
5a13863f8bf55085c847d437.name: Drunken Rage

5a1386418bf55085c847d4df.tooltip:
Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for {{ e6 }} seconds and granting True Sight for a short duration.

Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds. {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once.

Trapped enemies take an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) increased damage from Headshot.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4df.name: Yordle Snap Trap
5a1386418bf55085c847d4df.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d608.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d608.tooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Wukong then gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d608.name: Nimbus Strike

5a1385df8bf55085c847d26f.tooltip: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d26f.name: Wind Wall
5a1385df8bf55085c847d26f.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d609.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d609.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e7 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) per champion, up to {{ e9 }}. No longer generates Fury.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d609.name: Cull the Meek

5a1385de8bf55085c847d119.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d119.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d119.name: Monsoon

5a1385e08bf55085c847d2c6.description: Mordekaiser's next three attacks deal escalating bonus damage.
5a1385e08bf55085c847d2c6.tooltip: Mordekaiser's next three hits are empowered. The first two strikes deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) bonus magic damage. The final strike deals {{ e9 }} times the bonus damage of the previous strikes, up to {{ f5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f4 }}).
5a1385e08bf55085c847d2c6.name: Mace of Spades

5a13865c8bf55085c847d61a.description: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61a.tooltip:
Azir shields himself for {{ e6 }} seconds, blocking up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If Azir hits an enemy champion, he halts his dash and instantly prepares a new Sand Soldier.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61a.name: Shifting Sands

5a13863f8bf55085c847d445.description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d445.tooltip:
Katarina throws a Dagger, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the target and {{ e4 }} nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target.

The dagger always lands 350 units on the opposite side from where it struck the first target, getting there in the same amount of time regardless of how many times it bounces.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d445.name: Bouncing Blade

5a1386408bf55085c847d489.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
5a1386408bf55085c847d489.tooltip:
Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards the cursor and fan out past it. Rockets deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. Additional rocket hits deal reduced damage:

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage, max {{ e6 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total damage
Minions: 60% of base damage

Rocket hits against champions charge nearby turret beam attacks.
5a1386408bf55085c847d489.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets

5a1386428bf55085c847d52f.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Leaps to a location, gaining {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage and slows briefly if the unit landed on was an enemy.

Mega Gnar: Leaps to a location and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage to nearby enemies on landing. Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are slowed briefly.

If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce.
5a1386428bf55085c847d52f.name: Hop / Crunch
5a1386428bf55085c847d52f.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

5a13865c8bf55085c847d617.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d617.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d617.name: Ki Burst

5a13865a8bf55085c847d606.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d606.tooltip:
Jax enters a defensive stance for up to {{ e6 }} seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking {{ e3 }}% less damage from area of effect abilities.

After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for {{ e2 }} second and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to them.

Counter Strike deals {{ e5 }}% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: {{ e4 }}% increased damage).
5a13865a8bf55085c847d606.name: Counter Strike

5a1385de8bf55085c847d14b.tooltip: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain {{ e1 }} range and deal {{ e2 }}% (+{{ f1 }})% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d14b.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
5a1385de8bf55085c847d14b.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0cf.tooltip: Yorick summons a destructible wall of spirits with {{ e5 }} Health around target area for {{ e1 }} seconds. Allies can walk through the wall freely.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0cf.name: Dark Procession
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0cf.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f9.tooltip:
Xayah calls all Feathers back to her, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

Hitting an enemy with {{ e5 }} Feathers roots them for {{ e4 }} second.

Minions take {{ e2 }}% damage from Bladecaller.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f9.name: Bladecaller
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f9.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f8.tooltip: Xayah throws two knives dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage and leaving two Feathers. Targets hit after the first take {{ e2 }}% damage.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f8.name: Double Daggers
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f8.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

5a1386428bf55085c847d536.tooltip:
Blitzcrank supercharges himself, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration.

When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.
5a1386428bf55085c847d536.name: Overdrive
5a1386428bf55085c847d536.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d290.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d290.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 0.5 seconds. Charging grants Xin Zhao {{ e3 }}% attack speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d290.name: Audacious Charge

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b8.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b8.tooltip:
Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can redirect Wolf to new targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her.

Wolf's attacks deal magic damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f3 }}% of the target's current health.

Wolf attacks faster based on Kindred's attack speed. His attacks maim monsters for {{ e7 }}% increased damage and reduce their attack and movement speed by {{ e8 }}% for 2 seconds.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b8.name: Wolf's Frenzy

5a1386418bf55085c847d500.description: Swain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at up to 5 nearby enemies. Each raven deals damage and heals Swain by a flat amount.
5a1386418bf55085c847d500.tooltip:
Toggle: Swain transforms into a monstrous raven, spawning up to {{ e7 }} lesser ravens per second that strike out at nearby enemies, prioritizing champions. Each raven deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and heals Swain for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f9 }}) against champions and {{ e9 }} (+{{ f10 }}) against minions and monsters.

Ravens can't attack the same target for 1 second and the mana cost to sustain Ravenous Flock increases by {{ e8 }} Mana each second.
5a1386418bf55085c847d500.name: Ravenous Flock

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f3.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f3.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e6 }} second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f3.name: Scrap Shield

5a13865c8bf55085c847d61e.tooltip:
Fires a powder round that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies in a line.

After 2 seconds or {{ e6 }} seconds on collision with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61e.name: End of the Line
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61e.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.

5a1386408bf55085c847d480.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
5a1386408bf55085c847d480.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.
5a1386408bf55085c847d480.name: Eye Of The Storm

5a1385de8bf55085c847d14c.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d14c.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in it by {{ e2 }}%.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d14c.name: Void Ooze

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e7.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e7.tooltip:
Kled dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls.

If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} second and True Sight of the target. He can cast this ability again within {{ e6 }} seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e7.name: Jousting

5a1386438bf55085c847d551.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
5a1386438bf55085c847d551.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee places an invisible trap that lasts for 2 minutes. The trap triggers when an enemy walks over it, revealing the victim and bleeding them for {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

{{ f4 }} traps may be active at once. (Maximum traps increases at level 6, 11 and 16)

Cougar: Nidalee lunges in target direction, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
5a1386438bf55085c847d551.name: Bushwhack / Pounce

5a1386428bf55085c847d510.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
5a1386428bf55085c847d510.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional Magic Damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him {{ f2 }} Armor and {{ f1 }} Magic Resist for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Armor bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e6 }}% bonus Attack Damage.
Magic Resist bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e7 }}% Ability Power.
5a1386428bf55085c847d510.name: Grandmaster's Might

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f4.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Spike Racks</font>, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets are slowed for extra.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f4.tooltip:
Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies hit ({{ e5 }}% bonus damage to monsters). Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius.

Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and slows targets hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for {{ e7 }}% instead.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f4.name: Void Spike

5a1386438bf55085c847d55f.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by {{ e1 }}% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities.

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55f.name: Mega Adhesive
5a1386438bf55085c847d55f.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ff.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ff.name: Wither
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0ff.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.

5a1386408bf55085c847d47e.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
5a1386408bf55085c847d47e.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for {{ e4 }} seconds.

The whirlwind can be charged up to {{ e6 }} seconds. For each second charged, it:
  • Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage
    Knocks up for an additional {{ e5 }} seconds
    Travels {{ e3 }}% further

    • Howling Gale always reaches its destination in {{ e8 }} seconds.

    Activate again to release the whirlwind early.
5a1386408bf55085c847d47e.name: Howling Gale

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f5.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f5.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by {{ e2 }} second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This reduction is increased to {{ e3 }} seconds against champions.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f5.name: Spinning Slash

5a1386408bf55085c847d498.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista is near her Oathsworn, she gains +{{ f1 }}% Attack Speed. If they both basic attack the same target, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage. {{ e7 }} second cooldown per target.

Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions spotted are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 3 laps.

Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.
5a1386408bf55085c847d498.name: Sentinel
5a1386408bf55085c847d498.description:
Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

5a1386438bf55085c847d57d.description: Urgot charges in a direction, trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57d.tooltip:
Urgot charges forwards. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them behind him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Non-champions take the same damage but are knocked aside.

Cannot cross terrain.
5a1386438bf55085c847d57d.name: Disdain

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b8.description: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b8.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b8.name: Black Shield

5a1385df8bf55085c847d25e.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25e.tooltip: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void that fire projectiles inward, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and silencing enemies hit for {{ e2 }} second(s).
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25e.name: Call of the Void

5a1386578bf55085c847d5ed.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5ed.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path. This effect can be triggered even while immobilized.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5ed.name: Dragon Strike

5a1386438bf55085c847d56a.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.
5a1386438bf55085c847d56a.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for {{ e4 }} seconds.

On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for {{ e5 }} seconds, healing for {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increased by {{ e7 }}% for each {{ e8 }}% Health she is missing. During this time Lissandra is untargetable and invulnerable but is unable to take any actions.

Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for {{ e3 }} seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%.
5a1386438bf55085c847d56a.name: Frozen Tomb

5a1386438bf55085c847d55c.description: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55c.tooltip:
Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack. Max damage vs. monsters: {{ e5 }} per stack.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55c.name: Blighted Quiver

5a1385df8bf55085c847d299.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d299.tooltip: Ekko turns back time, going briefly untargetable and invulnerable. He teleports to where he was 4 seconds ago and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on arrival. Additionally, Ekko heals for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% of his health lost over the last 4 seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d299.name: Chronobreak

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e8.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e8.tooltip:
Kled charges toward a location, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing movement speed. While charging, Kled gains a shield that increases over time to a maximum of {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and lasts for 2 seconds after the charge ends.

Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to {{ f5 }}% (+{{ f1*3 }}%) of the target's maximum health as physical damage based on distance traveled.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e8.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!

5a1385df8bf55085c847d24a.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d24a.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d24a.name: Ice Shard

5a1386418bf55085c847d4db.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4db.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies and gains a bonus {{ e2 }}% movement speed that decays over {{ e7 }} seconds.

While Burnout is active, basic attacks deal {{ effect1amount*0.25 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*0.25 }}) (+{{ charabilitypower2*.25 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and extend its duration by {{ e8 }} second.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

Burnout has a maximum duration of {{ e9 }} seconds.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4db.name: Burnout

5a1386448bf55085c847d5a7.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a7.tooltip:
Passive: The Ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5a7.name: Command: Protect

5a1386448bf55085c847d591.tooltip:
Passive: Sivir gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Active: Sivir rallies her allies for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to {{ e2 }}% after the first {{ e5 }} seconds of On The Hunt elapse.
5a1386448bf55085c847d591.name: On The Hunt
5a1386448bf55085c847d591.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c7.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c7.tooltip: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it and slowing it by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c7.name: Zap!

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e3.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e3.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e3.name: Rampage

5a1386448bf55085c847d59d.description:
Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity.

Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.
5a1386448bf55085c847d59d.tooltip:
Viktor conjures a singularity at target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and interrupting enemy channels.
