5a1386428bf55085c847d542.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
5a1386428bf55085c847d542.tooltip:
Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, the remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.
5a1386428bf55085c847d542.name: The Box

5a1386418bf55085c847d4cf.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cf.tooltip:
Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage.

Void Rift has a 2 second cooldown between casts.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cf.name: Void Rift

5a13866a8bf55085c847d62b.description: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.
5a13866a8bf55085c847d62b.tooltip:
Enemy Summoner Spell and Active Item casts drop spell shards lasting 40 seconds. Some minions also drop a spell shard when Zoe kills them.

Active: Collecting a spell shard grants one cast of that spell.
____________________________________________

Passive: When Zoe casts a Summoner Spell or Spell Thief, she gains {{ e9 }}% movement speed for {{ e0 }} seconds and tosses up to 3 missiles at her attack target, dealing {{ e8 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage total. Each missile can apply More Sparkles!Movement speed bonus and missile damage improve with spell rank.
5a13866a8bf55085c847d62b.name: Spell Thief

5a1386408bf55085c847d4bd.tooltip:
Passive: Darius gains {{ e1 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4bd.name: Apprehend
5a1386408bf55085c847d4bd.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d9.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d9.tooltip:
Sion charges in a direction for 8 seconds and can steer slowly towards the mouse cursor. While charging, Sion is immune to all Crowd Control. Reactivating will cancel Sion's charge early.

When Sion collides with an enemy champion or wall, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocks up enemies in a small area for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in a larger area take the same damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 3 seconds.

The damage increases to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) and the stun increases to {{ e6 }} seconds as Sion charges farther.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d9.name: Unstoppable Onslaught

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f1.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f1.tooltip:
Passive: Kalista's spears pierce their target, lingering for 4 seconds.

Active: Rip the spears from nearby targets, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

If Rend kills at least one target, its cooldown is reset and its mana cost is refunded.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f1.name: Rend

5a1386598bf55085c847d5fd.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fd.tooltip:
Poppy smashes the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e5 }}% of the enemies' maximum Health as physical damage, and leaving an unstable area.

The area slows enemies inside it by {{ e3 }}% and erupts after {{ e4 }} second, dealing the initial damage again.
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fd.name: Hammer Shock

5a1386408bf55085c847d4b1.tooltip:
Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location that lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds and slows enemies within its area by {{ e3 }}%.

While inside the shroud Akali gains Invisibility and {{ e6 }}% movement speed. Attacking or using abilities briefly removes Invisibility.

Stealth - Invisible: Akali can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b1.name: Twilight Shroud
5a1386408bf55085c847d4b1.description: Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes Invisible and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Enemies inside the smoke have their Movement Speed reduced.

5a1386438bf55085c847d55b.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55b.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage. While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e7 }}%. After {{ e5 }} seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds {{ e4 }}% of its Mana cost.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum {{ e9 }}%).

Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if the arrow detonates Blight stacks from at least one enemy champion.
5a1386438bf55085c847d55b.name: Piercing Arrow

5a1386408bf55085c847d49e.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49e.tooltip:
Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to another champion ally.

If cast while affected by Rejuvenation, Soraka will grant her target its benefits for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Cannot be cast if Soraka is below 5% Health.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49e.name: Astral Infusion

5a1385de8bf55085c847d137.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d137.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} seconds and deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d137.name: Feral Scream

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a3.tooltip: Reduces Zilean's other basic spell cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a3.name: Rewind
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1a3.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c5.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks grant Focus for {{ e1 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e2 }} times. Stacks fall off one at a time, and at {{ e2 }} stacks, Ranger's Focus can be cast, consuming all Focus.

Active: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Ashe gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed, and her basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage. During this time, she does not stack Focus. Ranger's Focus applies Frost Shot.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c5.name: Ranger's Focus
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c5.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5e1.tooltip:
Camille winds up and then slices in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

Enemies hit by the outer half are slowed by {{ e4 }}%, decaying over {{ e2 }} seconds. They take extra physical damage equal to {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) of their maximum health, and Camille heals for {{ e9 }}% of the bonus damage dealt to champions.

Tactical Sweep does {{ e8 }}% less damage to non-epic monsters.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e1.name: Tactical Sweep
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e1.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a3.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a3.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone. The clone lasts up to 18 seconds and detonates when it dies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes.

  • Mini boxes deal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage, make enemies flee for {{ e7 }} second(s), and trigger together.

    Clone deals {{ e8 }}% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

    • The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a3.name: Hallucinate

5a1386428bf55085c847d515.tooltip:
Taunt an enemy champion or monster for {{ e1 }} seconds and gain {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for the same duration.

While any of Rammus' other spells are active, Frenzying Taunt's Attack Speed bonus is refreshed.
5a1386428bf55085c847d515.name: Frenzying Taunt
5a1386428bf55085c847d515.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d296.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d296.tooltip: Ekko throws a device that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by {{ e2 }}%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all targets hit upon return.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d296.name: Timewinder

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ef.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ef.tooltip:
Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb to a location. The bomb sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it (prioritizes Champions). After {{ e2 }} seconds it detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all surrounding enemies.

Placing two bombs on a unit detonates the first bomb early, stunning all enemies in the blast for {{ e4 }} seconds.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4ef.name: Time Bomb

5a1386428bf55085c847d50d.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
5a1386428bf55085c847d50d.tooltip:
After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown by 10% (currently {{ f2.0*100 }}%).
5a1386428bf55085c847d50d.name: Dark Matter

5a1386418bf55085c847d4cc.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cc.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cc.name: Arcanopulse

5a1386428bf55085c847d519.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
5a1386428bf55085c847d519.tooltip:
Taliyah targets an area. After a short delay, enemies caught within the area will be pushed and dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

You can control the direction enemies will be pushed by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.
5a1386428bf55085c847d519.name: Seismic Shove

5a1386408bf55085c847d49b.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49b.tooltip:
Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f1 }}% of enemies' maximum Health as magic damage and slow by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, decaying over the duration.

Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.
Spikes deal an additional 0.5% of enemies' maximum Health per Feast stack.
Percent Health damage against minions and monsters is capped at {{ e8 }}.
5a1386408bf55085c847d49b.name: Vorpal Spikes

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1f0.description: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing damage and temporarily slowing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1f0.tooltip: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1f0.name: Ice Blast

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0e1.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0e1.tooltip: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0e1.name: Spirit Rush

5a1385df8bf55085c847d261.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d261.tooltip: Malzahar suppresses a target champion for {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing {{ e7 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a2 }})</scaleAP> magic damage over the duration. A zone of negative energy is created around his target for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }}% <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }}%)</scaleAP> of nearby enemies max health as magic damage per second.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d261.name: Nether Grasp

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a6.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a6.tooltip:
Leaps to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range by 200, and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a6.name: Leap

5a1386428bf55085c847d53f.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
5a1386428bf55085c847d53f.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.
5a1386428bf55085c847d53f.name: Death Sentence

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1bb.description: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, mighty talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing damage and rooting them.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1bb.tooltip: Swain marks the target area that triggers after a brief delay dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies within range and rooting them for {{ e2 }} second(s).
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1bb.name: Nevermove

5a1386428bf55085c847d504.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
5a1386428bf55085c847d504.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.
5a1386428bf55085c847d504.name: Thunder Claws

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b7.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b7.tooltip: Curses an area for {{ e7 }} seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b7.name: Tormented Soil

5a1385e08bf55085c847d2cc.tooltip: Reveals terrain as it flies toward target location anywhere on the map. Grants vision for {{ e4 }} seconds. Ashe can store up to 2 charges of Hawkshot.
5a1385e08bf55085c847d2cc.name: Hawkshot
5a1385e08bf55085c847d2cc.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e4.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e4.tooltip:
Flings a magical feather that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic monster, Rakan restores {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health to himself and nearby allies after {{ e4 }} seconds or when he touches an ally.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e4.name: Gleaming Quill

5a1386428bf55085c847d53c.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
5a1386428bf55085c847d53c.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}). While Granite Shield is active, this bonus is tripled to {{ f4.0 }}% ({{ f3 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a1386428bf55085c847d53c.name: Brutal Strikes

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fd.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fd.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as Magic Damage and {{ e2 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ e3 }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ e3 }} seconds after the drain ends.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0fd.name: Subjugate

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c6.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c6.tooltip:
Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable. She then rains down daggers which deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and leave behind a line of Feathers.

Xayah can move while in the air.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c6.name: Featherstorm

5a13865d8bf55085c847d621.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
5a13865d8bf55085c847d621.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f2 }}% of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage.

Wolf's attack critically strikes targets for {{ e6 }}% increased damage if they are below {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) health (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

[Maximum {{ e0 }} vs. monsters]
5a13865d8bf55085c847d621.name: Mounting Dread

5a1385df8bf55085c847d23d.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23d.name: Insanity Potion
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23d.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d607.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d607.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a nearby location and fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d607.name: Arcane Shift

5a1385df8bf55085c847d29f.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d29f.name: Blood Rush

5a13863f8bf55085c847d42e.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42e.tooltip:
Curses target champion or monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with a basic attack or ability, she will expunge the Curse, refund its mana cost, and briefly slow the target by {{ e3 }}%.

If the Curse lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it Charms the target for {{ e2 }} second(s) and:
  • Against champions: shreds Magic Resist by {{ e9 }}% for {{ e0 }} seconds.
    Against monsters: deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Charm duration increased by {{ e1 }} seconds.

    • Casting Allure does not remove Evelynn from Demon Shade.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42e.name: Allure

5a1386598bf55085c847d601.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
5a1386598bf55085c847d601.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for up to {{ e3 }} seconds. The further the Axe flies, the longer the slow lasts, but it is never less than {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
5a1386598bf55085c847d601.name: Undertow

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c1.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c1.tooltip: Gragas hurls his cask, causing it to explode when it lands. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked away from the explosion.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0c1.name: Explosive Cask

5a1386438bf55085c847d54b.tooltip:
Ornn summons a massive lava elemental which stampedes toward him. Enemies run over by the elemental take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage, are slowed by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds and become Brittle for {{ f10 }} seconds.

Ornn can recast this ability to smash into the elemental to redirect and empower it. The empowered elemental knocks up enemies for 1.5 seconds, deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and applies Brittle.
5a1386438bf55085c847d54b.name: Call of the Forge God
5a1386438bf55085c847d54b.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

5a1386438bf55085c847d54d.tooltip:
Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.

The next attack in Cannon Stance reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ f3 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a1386438bf55085c847d54d.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
5a1386438bf55085c847d54d.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c4.tooltip:
Xayah creates a storm of blades for {{ e2 }} seconds that grant her {{ e1 }}% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for {{ e5 }}% damage.

If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, Xayah gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c4.name: Deadly Plumage
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c4.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.

5a13865b8bf55085c847d613.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d613.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d613.name: Hail of Arrows

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e5.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e5.tooltip:
Kled throws a bear trap that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight. Deals 150% damage to minions passed through.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for {{ e3 }} seconds, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*2 }}) physical damage, yanks the enemy toward him, and slows the enemy by {{ e5 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e5.name: Bear Trap on a Rope

5a13863f8bf55085c847d453.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d453.tooltip:
Breathes out a blast of pure starfire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The blast will also knock nearby enemies back to Aurelion Sol's Outer Limit.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d453.name: Voice of Light

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f7.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f7.tooltip:
Activate: Drains {{ e2 }} Mana per second.

Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail that increases in size over {{ e7 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to targets and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}%.

When the Glacial Storm is fully formed, it slows targets' Movement Speed by {{ f1 }}% and does {{ e3 }}% damage instead.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f7.name: Glacial Storm

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c0.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains {{ e5 }} Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e2 }}.

Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Love Taps reduce the cooldown of Strut by {{ f2 }} seconds.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c0.name: Strut
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c0.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d11e.tooltip: Ivern conjures a vine dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e1 }} second(s). Allies can click on rooted enemies to dash into attack range.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d11e.name: Rootcaller
5a1385de8bf55085c847d11e.description: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

5a1386438bf55085c847d586.description: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or basic attacks, they are rooted.
5a1386438bf55085c847d586.tooltip:
Jhin fires a long range shot that stops on the first champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to it, and {{ e4 }}% of that damage to minions and monsters hit along the way.

If Deadly Flourish strikes a champion that has been hit by one of Jhin's basic attacks, Lotus Traps, or allies within the last 4 seconds it will root them for {{ e2 }} seconds and grants Jhin movement speed as though he had crit them.
5a1386438bf55085c847d586.name: Deadly Flourish

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a7.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.

Active: Kha'Zix becomes Invisible for {{ e1 }} seconds and activates Unseen Threat. While Invisible, he gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed and ignores unit collision. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: While out of combat, Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault for {{ e5 }} seconds in brush. This persists for up to {{ f1 }} seconds after exiting the brush ({{ f1 }} second per brush cooldown).

Stealth - Invisible: Kha'Zix can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a7.name: Void Assault
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a7.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.

5a1386448bf55085c847d58a.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
5a1386448bf55085c847d58a.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward terrified enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes terrified for {{ e2 }} second(s).
5a1386448bf55085c847d58a.name: Unspeakable Horror

5a1386438bf55085c847d557.tooltip:
Bard sends magical energy arcing to a target location. On impact, all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets in the target area are put in stasis, becoming invincible, untargetable, and unable to act for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Epic monsters are also put into stasis, despite normally being immune to disables.
5a1386438bf55085c847d557.name: Tempered Fate
5a1386438bf55085c847d557.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0af.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0af.tooltip: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by {{ e3 }}% and grants Vi {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds (max {{ e5 }} damage vs. monsters).
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0af.name: Denting Blows

5a1386418bf55085c847d503.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
5a1386418bf55085c847d503.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Minions and monsters are feared as well.
5a1386418bf55085c847d503.name: Majestic Roar

5a1386438bf55085c847d549.tooltip:
Ornn stomps forwards unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself for {{ f5 }} (12% max health) for {{ e5 }} seconds. The fire deals up to {{ e0 }}% of the enemy's max health as magic damage (minimum {{ e3 }}).

Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle for {{ f9 }} seconds. The next immobilizing effect against a Brittle enemy has its duration increased by 30% and deals {{ f8 }}% of their max health as magic damage.

Ornn's basic attacks knock back Brittle targets.
5a1386438bf55085c847d549.name: Bellows Breath
5a1386438bf55085c847d549.description: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d436.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d436.tooltip:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location. When reactivated, or after {{ e4 }} seconds, the cask will explode, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The damage and slow amount increase as the cask ferments, up to {{ e6 }}% after {{ e5 }} seconds. Deals {{ e7 }}% damage to minions.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d436.name: Barrel Roll

5a1386428bf55085c847d53d.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
5a1386428bf55085c847d53d.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.
5a1386428bf55085c847d53d.name: Ground Slam

5a13863f8bf55085c847d430.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d430.tooltip: Evelynn unleashes her demonic energy, becoming untargetable and decimating enemies in front of her. She then warps backwards. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, increased to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) to enemies below {{ e7 }}% health.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d430.name: Last Caress

5a13865d8bf55085c847d61f.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
5a13865d8bf55085c847d61f.tooltip: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for {{ e2 }} seconds (does not reveal stealth).
5a13865d8bf55085c847d61f.name: Phosphorus Bomb

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ec.tooltip:
Passive: When Dr. Mundo suffers magic damage or pays a health cost, his magic resist is increased by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e0 }} seconds, up to a maximum of {{ f3*100 }}%.

Active: Dr. Mundo's next basic attack will headbutt the enemy, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage ({{ e1 }}% of maximum health) at the cost of {{ e2 }} health.

Upon activation, Dr. Mundo gains up to {{ e4 }} attack damage (no less than {{ e5 }}) for {{ e6 }} seconds based on his missing health.

Masochism grants {{ f2 }} attack damage above the minimum for every 1% of missing health ({{ f5 }}).

5a1386418bf55085c847d4ec.description: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e0.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e0.tooltip:
Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to {{ e2 }} range. The shot deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.

Grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b6.description: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d0b6.tooltip: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a1386688bf55085c847d629.tooltip:
Ornn charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

If Ornn rams into terrain, the resulting shockwave will deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage and knock up enemies for {{ e6 }} second.

The shockwave destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemy champions.

5a1386688bf55085c847d629.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d25b.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25b.tooltip: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health each second.

5a1386428bf55085c847d537.description: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
5a1386428bf55085c847d537.tooltip:
Passive: Lightning arcs off of Blitzcrank to hit a random nearby enemy for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every 2.5 seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds. The passive is not in effect during the cooldown.

5a1386428bf55085c847d528.description: Nunu begins to sap the area of heat, slowing all nearby enemies. When Absolute Zero ends, he deals massive damage to all enemies caught in the area.
5a1386428bf55085c847d528.tooltip:
Nunu channels for {{ e4 }} seconds, sapping the area of heat. Nearby enemies have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e2 }}% and their Attack Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}%. The Movement Speed slow increases to {{ e6 }}% over the duration of the channel.

Enemies caught in the area when the channel ends take up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, depending on how long Absolute Zero was channeled.
(Minimum Damage: {{ f2 }})

5a1386438bf55085c847d570.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.
5a1386438bf55085c847d570.tooltip:
Sends forward vines dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting enemies for {{ e5 }} second(s).

Garden of Thorns: If Grasping Roots passes near a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. A Vine Lasher has 400 range and lasts {{ f2 }} seconds.

5a1386438bf55085c847d560.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
5a1386438bf55085c847d560.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a1386648bf55085c847d624.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.
5a1386648bf55085c847d624.tooltip:
Whip target with Lashers, applying on hit effects and dealing magic damage equal to {{ f1 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max health. Then, gain {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Entering Demon Shade resets Whiplash's cooldown and empowers it. When empowered, Whiplash pulls Evelynn to her target, dealing magic damage to them and enemies in the way equal to {{ f2 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their max health.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4c1.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4c1.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per wave ({{ e2 }} waves total).

5a1385df8bf55085c847d298.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d298.tooltip: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.

5a13866a8bf55085c847d62a.tooltip:

Recast to redirect the missile to a new position near Zoe.

5a13866a8bf55085c847d62a.description: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4dc.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4dc.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that stops after hitting a champion. All enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f4 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are marked for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Shyvana's basic attacks against marked targets deal {{ e4 }}% of their maximum health as magic damage on hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f5 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies on scorched earth take {{ f3 }} (+{{ f6 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage per second.

Flame Breath's on-hit damage against monsters is capped at {{ e3 }} damage per hit.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e7.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e7.tooltip:
Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison. If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed decaying over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Noxious Poison deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a13865a8bf55085c847d60c.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60c.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (deals {{ e2 }}% damage to minions and monsters).

Damage per Strike: {{ f1 }}

5a1386438bf55085c847d54e.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
5a1386438bf55085c847d54e.tooltip:
Tristana launches herself to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5c2.description: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each unit's movement speed toward one another. While near one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5c2.tooltip:
Passive: Mordekaiser gains bonus experience for killing minions near allied champions.

Bonus Experience Earned: {{ f3 }}

Active: Target an ally, linking them to Mordekaiser:

  • Both gain up to {{ e5 }} movement speed toward one another.

    When they touch, they deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds to nearby enemies.

    Reactivate to both instantly steal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health from nearby enemies ({{ e7 }}% heal on minions, max {{ e8 }} units; deals magic damage).

5a1386408bf55085c847d471.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target increases Quinn's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386408bf55085c847d471.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d3.tooltip:
Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.

When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Movement Speed for 1 second.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4af.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4af.tooltip:
Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies above it by {{ e4 }}%.

Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for {{ e5 }} seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.

Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

5a1386438bf55085c847d57e.tooltip:
Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first enemy champion hit. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows for {{ e4 }} seconds by up to {{ e3 }}% based on the victim's missing health.

For 6 seconds, Olaf gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}%.

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f7.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.

5a1386438bf55085c847d567.tooltip:
Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next {{ e2 }} seconds and then stabs in the target direction.

The stab deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and slows their movement and attack speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Fiora parries an immobilizing effect, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.
5a1386438bf55085c847d567.name: Riposte
5a1386438bf55085c847d567.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d19d.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates <scaleHealth>{{ f1 }}</scaleHealth> Health ({{ e1 }}% of max health) over {{ e2 }} seconds, and gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed for the duration.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d19d.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.

5a1385e08bf55085c847d2cd.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
5a1385e08bf55085c847d2cd.tooltip: Launches a crystal arrow of ice that stuns the first enemy Champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The farther the arrow flies, the longer the stun, up to {{ e2 }} seconds. Surrounding enemies take half damage.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d459.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d459.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f4 }})% Damage Reduction from Magic Damage and {{ f5 }}% of that amount as Damage Reduction from Physical Damage. While charging, Galio slows himself by {{ e3 }}%.

Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for {{ e4 }} to {{ e7 }} seconds and refreshes the Damage Reduction for {{ e8 }} seconds. Taunt duration and radius increase with charge time.

Shield of Durand's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

5a13864e8bf55085c847d5d7.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d42d.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d42d.tooltip:
Evelynn's Lasher strikes in the target direction, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to the first unit hit and causing Evelynn's next 3 spells or attacks on that unit deal {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Then, Evelynn can recast this ability up to 3 times.

Recast: Fires spikes through the nearest enemy, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all units hit.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5ba.tooltip:
Lamb blesses the ground underneath her for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.

When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.

5a1386598bf55085c847d5fe.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
5a1386598bf55085c847d5fe.tooltip: Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and carrying them forward. If Poppy carries the target into terrain, the enemy takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional physical damage and is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a1385de8bf55085c847d126.description: LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing magic damage. When Shatter Orb is empowered by Sigil of Malice, the spell bounces to the nearest ready Sigil of Malice (bounces deal reduced damage to minions).
5a1385de8bf55085c847d126.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. When Shatter Orb is empowered by Sigil of Malice, the spell bounces to the nearest ready Sigil of Malice (bounces deal {{ e7 }}% damage to minions).

5a13865a8bf55085c847d60d.description:
Rengar slashes all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line. Casting this outside the max range moves Rengar a short distance in that direction.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage.
5a13865a8bf55085c847d60d.tooltip:
Slash all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage per strike.

Ferocity effect:
Each hit deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage.

5a1386568bf55085c847d5e2.tooltip:
First Cast: Fire a hookshot that attaches to terrain, pulling Camille to it and allowing Hookshot to be recast for 1 second.

Second Cast: Camille leaps from the wall, colliding with the first enemy champion hit. Upon landing, she deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and a {{ e1 }} second stun to nearby enemies. Dashes towards enemy champions travel twice as far and grant {{ e2 }}% attack speed for {{ e5 }} seconds on impact.
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e2.name: Hookshot
5a1386568bf55085c847d5e2.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d25d.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font>, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d25d.tooltip: Amumu entangles nearby enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying Curse. Entangled enemies are unable to attack or move for 2 seconds.

5a1386648bf55085c847d626.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, drain Mana, and scale {{ e5 }}% less with bonus Attack Speed.

Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ f4 }}% (bonus scales with spell rank and Jinx's level). Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.
5a1386648bf55085c847d626.name: Switcheroo!
5a1386648bf55085c847d626.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d467.tooltip:
Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to up to 4 Dark Spheres previously created.

Damage per sphere: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

5a1386408bf55085c847d472.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.
5a1386408bf55085c847d472.tooltip:
Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage while Valor marks it as Vulnerable.

Upon reaching the target, Quinn leaps off, briefly displacing and slowing it by {{ e1 }}% (diminishing over {{ e3 }} seconds).

5a13863f8bf55085c847d468.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d468.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e3 }} for {{ e6 }} seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

5a1386428bf55085c847d540.tooltip:
Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him.

The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.

5a1386428bf55085c847d540.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d46c.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d46c.tooltip:

5a1386418bf55085c847d4d0.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4d0.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b4.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b4.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b4.name: Lunar Rush

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cf.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cf.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1cf.name: Empower

5a1386408bf55085c847d497.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
5a1386408bf55085c847d497.tooltip:

If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.

5a13863f8bf55085c847d43b.tooltip:

5a13863f8bf55085c847d43b.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5ec.description:

If {{ e9 }} Runes are discharged, they Overload, shielding Ryze from {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage and increasing his Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386578bf55085c847d5eb.name: Behind Enemy Lines
5a1386578bf55085c847d5eb.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b5.tooltip: Removes all disables from Alistar. For {{ e1 }} seconds Alistar takes {{ e2 }}% reduced physical and magical damage.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b5.name: Unbreakable Will
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1b5.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

5a1386428bf55085c847d506.tooltip:
Shen's spirit blade creates a defensive zone for {{ e1 }} seconds. Basic attacks that would hit Shen or an allied champion in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, the spirit blade will not activate until one enters or {{ e2 }} seconds pass.
5a1386428bf55085c847d506.name: Spirit's Refuge
5a1386428bf55085c847d506.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

5a1386408bf55085c847d4a0.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes Invisible for {{ e3 }} seconds. Shaco remains Invisible even if he uses Jack in the Box or Hallucinate.

His next basic attack during or shortly after Invisibility will reduce Deceive's cooldown by {{ f3 }} seconds.

Stealth - Invisible: Shaco can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a0.name: Deceive
5a1386408bf55085c847d4a0.description: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.

5a13865b8bf55085c847d614.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d614.tooltip:
Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects. This attack prioritizes Vitals and enemies it will kill.

If this ability hits an enemy, {{ e4 }}% of its cooldown is refunded.
5a13865b8bf55085c847d614.name: Lunge

5a1386578bf55085c847d5e4.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e4.tooltip:
Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales).

Devastating Charge's remaining duration pauses during Onslaught of Shadows.
5a1386578bf55085c847d5e4.name: Devastating Charge

5a1386418bf55085c847d4da.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4da.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing {{ f2 }} and {{ f1 }} physical damage on the first and second hits respectively.

While Twin Bite is on cooldown, basic attacks reduce the remaining cooldown duration by {{ e3 }} seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

Twin Bite's second hit damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Shyvana's attack damage.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4da.name: Twin Bite

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1bc.description: Swain afflicts his target, dealing damage to them over time and causing them to take increased damage from Swain. Enemies afflicted by Torment are focused by Beatrice while Decrepify is active.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1bc.tooltip: Swain afflicts his target with a curse that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds and amplifies Swain's damage against it by {{ e2 }}%.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1bc.name: Torment

5a1385df8bf55085c847d1d5.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1d5.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).
5a1385df8bf55085c847d1d5.name: Requiem

5a1386418bf55085c847d4e5.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e5.tooltip:
Flies to an allied champion, granting them a {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health shield for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Can be re-cast at no cost once within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Battle Dance's cast range is increased when cast on Xayah.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4e5.name: Battle Dance

5a1385df8bf55085c847d262.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d262.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d262.name: Wild Cards

5a1386588bf55085c847d5f3.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Reaper Claws</font>, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f3.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is Isolated, the damage is increased by {{ e2 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Evolved Reaper Claws: Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e3 }}. If target is Isolated, refunds {{ e4 }}% of Taste Their Fear's cooldown.
5a1386588bf55085c847d5f3.name: Taste Their Fear

5a1386448bf55085c847d5b2.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b2.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).
5a1386448bf55085c847d5b2.name: Pale Cascade

5a1386408bf55085c847d476.tooltip:
Ryze opens a portal to a location up to {{ e7 }} range away. After {{ e4 }} seconds, all allies near the portal are teleported to that location.

If Ryze becomes unable to cast or move, Realm Warp is cancelled.
5a1386408bf55085c847d476.name: Realm Warp
5a1386408bf55085c847d476.description: Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

5a1386438bf55085c847d569.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
5a1386438bf55085c847d569.tooltip:
Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
5a1386438bf55085c847d569.name: Glacial Path

5a1386418bf55085c847d4f5.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f5.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4f5.name: The Equalizer

5a1386428bf55085c847d53b.tooltip:
Rengar gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and True Sight of the nearest enemy champion (within {{ e3 }} range) for {{ e2 }} seconds.

After the first {{ e6 }} seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap to an enemy without being in brush. Leaping to the nearest champion results in a critical strike.

Attacking or casting most spells ends Thrill of the Hunt.
Stealth - Camouflaged: This character is hidden from view. It is revealed by nearby enemy champions and turrets.
5a1386428bf55085c847d53b.name: Thrill of the Hunt
5a1386428bf55085c847d53b.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.

5a1386428bf55085c847d518.description: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
5a1386428bf55085c847d518.tooltip:
Hurls 5 rocks in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area around the first enemy hit. Subsequent hits on the same unit deal {{ e2 }}% reduced damage. Creates Worked Ground for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Taliyah gains {{ f2 }}% movement speed on Worked Ground. Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground only hurls one rock but refunds {{ e7 }}% of its mana cost.
5a1386428bf55085c847d518.name: Threaded Volley

5a1386428bf55085c847d51a.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
5a1386428bf55085c847d51a.tooltip:
Places a field of dash-sensitive traps that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies in the area by {{ f2 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the traps explode, dealing damage again.

Enemies dashing, being pushed, or being pulled through Unraveled Earth will trigger traps, taking {{ f3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage from each trap (maximum 4, each hit after the first deals {{ f4 }}% less damage).
5a1386428bf55085c847d51a.name: Unraveled Earth

5a1385df8bf55085c847d23e.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23e.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each.
5a1385df8bf55085c847d23e.name: Light Binding

5a13865c8bf55085c847d61b.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) extra physical damage and reduce his other cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds.
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61b.name: Three Talon Strike
5a13865c8bf55085c847d61b.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

5a1386598bf55085c847d603.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
5a1386598bf55085c847d603.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up the closest enemy for {{ e5 }} second. All other nearby enemies will be knocked back. An enemy who has been knocked up will be immune from further Un-burrow effects for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.
5a1386598bf55085c847d603.name: Burrow / Un-burrow

5a1386418bf55085c847d4cd.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cd.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit.

The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If no barrages are fired, {{ e7 }}% of the cooldown is refunded.
5a1386418bf55085c847d4cd.name: Rite of the Arcane

5a1386448bf55085c847d5ae.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ae.tooltip:
Active: Corki flies a short distance, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

Special Delivery: Corki flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and leave a burning trail for 5 seconds. The trail slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% and burns them for {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second.
5a1386448bf55085c847d5ae.name: Valkyrie

5a13863f8bf55085c847d446.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d446.tooltip:
Katarina dashes in the blink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger. If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range.

Picking up a Dagger will reduce Shunpo's cooldown by {{ f1 }} seconds ({{ f3*100 }}%).

Katarina can blink to any location near the target.
5a13863f8bf55085c847d446.name: Shunpo

5a1385de8bf55085c847d16f.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d16f.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.
5a1385de8bf55085c847d16f.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a8.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!
5a1385288bf55085c847c5a8.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a2.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
5a1385288bf55085c847c5a2.name: Exhaust

5a1385288bf55085c847c59d.description: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.
5a1385288bf55085c847c59d.name: Clarity

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a1.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.
5a1385288bf55085c847c5a1.name: Disabled Summoner Spells

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a4.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
5a1385288bf55085c847c5a4.name: Mark

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a0.description: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
5a1385288bf55085c847c5a0.name: Poro Toss

5a1385288bf55085c847c5af.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.

5a1385288bf55085c847c59c.description: Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a9.description: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of 28-45% (depending on champion level) Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.

5a1385288bf55085c847c599.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
5a1385288bf55085c847c599.name: Cleanse

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a6.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
5a1385288bf55085c847c5a6.name: To the King!

5a1385288bf55085c847c59b.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a7.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

5a1385288bf55085c847c59a.description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

5a1385288bf55085c847c59e.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

5a1385288bf55085c847c5a3.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.

5a1385288bf55085c847c5ac.description: After channeling for 4.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.
