description: Damaging enemy champions causes them to take 3% more damage from your allies
5a1384b38bf55085c847ac01.name: Expose Weakness

description: Reduces the cooldown of Summoner Spells by 15%
5a1384b38bf55085c847ac00.name: Insight

description: +0.8% Attack Speed
+1.6% Attack Speed
+2.4% Attack Speed
+3.2% Attack Speed
+4% Attack Speed
5a1384b38bf55085c847abe1.name: Fury

description: Single target attacks and spells deal 1 bonus damage to minions and monsters
Single target attacks and spells deal 2 bonus damage to minions and monsters
Single target attacks and spells deal 3 bonus damage to minions and monsters
Single target attacks and spells deal 4 bonus damage to minions and monsters
Single target attacks and spells deal 5 bonus damage to minions and monsters
5a1384b38bf55085c847abf5.name: Savagery

description: +15 Movement Speed in Brush and River
5a1384b38bf55085c847abe6.name: Explorer

description: Killing a unit restores 20 Health (30 second cooldown)
5a1384b38bf55085c847abfa.name: Feast

description: Deal 2% increased damage to champions when no allied champions are nearby
5a1384b38bf55085c847abf2.name: Assassin

description: Deal 1% increased damage for each unique enemy champion you have killed
5a1384b38bf55085c847abe9.name: Bounty Hunter

description: +3% Tenacity and Slow Resist
+6% Tenacity and Slow Resist
+9% Tenacity and Slow Resist
+12% Tenacity and Slow Resist
+15% Tenacity and Slow Resist
5a1384b38bf55085c847abe3.name: Swiftness

description: Regenerate 0.25% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
Regenerate 0.5% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
Regenerate 0.75% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
Regenerate 1.0% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
Regenerate 1.25% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
5a1384b38bf55085c847abea.name: Meditation

description: Hitting champions with basic attacks generates a Fervor stack (2 for melee attacks). Stacks of Fervor last 8 seconds (max 8 stacks)and increase your AD by 1-8 for each stack.
5a1384b38bf55085c847abfe.name: Fervor of Battle

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc92.description: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc92.name: Contempt for the Weak

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb1.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb1.name: Carnivore

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc9.description: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc9.name: Serpentine Grace

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf6.description: Every several seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf6.name: Iceborn

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9b.description: Gains a charge of Essence Theft whenever a spell hits an enemy (max: 3 charges per spell). Upon reaching 9 charges, Ahri's next spell heals her whenever it hits an enemy.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9b.name: Essence Theft

5a1387728bf55085c847fd32.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.
5a1387728bf55085c847fd32.name: Friend of the Forest

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb8.description: Akali's first two attacks are empowered. The first strike heals her, and the second strike deals bonus magic damage. Twin Disciplines will recharge itself automatically a short while after being used.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb8.name: Twin Disciplines

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc4.description:
After being killed, Sion will reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, gain 100% Lifesteal and deal bonus damage equal to 10% of his target's maximum Health (max 75 to monsters).

All his abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants a burst of Movement Speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc4.name: Glory in Death

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf1.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf1.name: Living Vengeance

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc93.description: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 6% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc93.name: Happy Hour

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce0.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce0.name: Void Stone

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfd.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfd.name: Echoing Flames

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0f.description: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0f.name: Hextech Munitions

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8e.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8e.name: Pyromania

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdd.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdd.name: Cell Division

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd14.description: Aatrox fills up his Blood Well through his abilities. When filled, Aatrox becomes Hellbent for as long as he stays in combat with champions or monsters, granting him attack damage, attack speed, and the ability to survive fatal damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd14.name: Blood Well

5a13876a8bf55085c847fced.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fced.name: Draw a Bead

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca6.description: <mainText>Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca6.name: Arcane Mastery

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcaf.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcaf.name: Double Strike

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb9.description: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb9.name: Rebirth

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd04.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd04.name: Fleet of Foot

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdf.description: After 5 attacks, Nunu's next spell costs no Mana and is empowered to do its next rank's effects.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdf.name: Visionary

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbe.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbe.name: Clean Cuts

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0d.description: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0d.name: New Destiny

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce5.description:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce5.name: Unseen Predator

5a13876a8bf55085c847fccf.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fccf.name: Berserker Rage

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd01.description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd01.name: Whisper

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9d.description: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9d.name: Crimson Pact

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca5.description: Valor periodically marks enemies as <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font>. Quinn's first basic attack against <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> targets will deal bonus physical damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca5.name: Harrier

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce4.description: When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 50% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce4.name: Mana Barrier

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd12.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd12.name: Mark of the Kindred

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8f.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8f.name: Blast Shield

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcec.description: After casting Transform Jayce gains 40 Movement Speed and can move through units for the next 1.25 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcec.name: Hextech Capacitor

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcad.description:
When LeBlanc damages an enemy with a spell, she marks the target for 4 seconds. After 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc's next spell shatters the Sigil to deal magic damage.

Sigil of Malice cannot occur again on the same unit for 5 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcad.name: Sigil of Malice

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9e.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9e.name: Warpath

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb4.description: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb4.name: Unseen Threat

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc94.description: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc94.name: Power Chord

5a1387748bf55085c847fd35.description: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.
5a1387748bf55085c847fd35.name: More Sparkles!

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf8.description:
Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level and lasting 45 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies.

Zyra can cast spells near seeds to grow plants. Extra plants striking the same target deal reduced damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf8.name: Garden of Thorns

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc96.description:
Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to 20% of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for 1.5-2.5 seconds.

This effect has a 20-10 second cooldown.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc96.name: Adaptive Defenses

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9f.description:
Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9f.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0a.description: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0a.name: Staggering Blow

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfb.description:
When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

Damage from lane minions is unaffected.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfb.name: Void Shift

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca8.description: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca8.name: Martial Cadence

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb7.description: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb7.name: Concussive Blows

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc97.description: <mainText>Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc97.name: Shepherd of Souls

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca0.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca0.name: Blade's End

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd3.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd3.name: Chosen of the Storm

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd5.description: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd5.name: Gathering Fire

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcae.description: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcae.name: The Darkin Scythe

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce3.description: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce3.name: Aegis Protection

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd11.description: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd11.name: Sap Magic

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf0.description: <mainText>Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf0.name: Colossal Smash

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb3.description: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb3.name: Backstab

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce9.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce9.name: Surging Tides

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcac.description: Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcac.name: Hextech Affinity

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd2.description: Swain regenerates Mana each time he kills a unit. This amount increases each level.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd2.name: Carrion Renewal

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcaa.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcaa.name: Night Hunter

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd0.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and all nearby allied champions.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd0.name: Triumphant Roar

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbc.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbc.name: Love Tap

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca2.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca2.name: King's Tribute

5a13876a8bf55085c847fccb.description: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fccb.name: Crystal Spires

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9c.description: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9c.name: Center of the Universe

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcff.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcff.name: Way of the Wanderer

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd00.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd00.name: Sunlight

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcda.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcda.name: Rising Spell Force

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd02.description:
Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd02.name: Umbra Blades

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf7.description:
Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer.

Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf7.name: Dread

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc3.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc3.name: Lightslinger

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb0.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb0.name: Martial Poise

5a1387738bf55085c847fd34.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 2% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.
5a1387738bf55085c847fd34.name: Blaze

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0e.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0e.name: Trial by Fire

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf9.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf9.name: Perseverance

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca4.description: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca4.name: Nimble Fighter

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf5.description: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf5.name: Duelist's Dance

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb5.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb5.name: Battle Fury

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce6.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce6.name: Granite Shield

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd08.description: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd08.name: Glorious Evolution

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdb.description: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdb.name: Rock Surfing

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca7.description: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca7.name: Monkey's Agility

5a13876a8bf55085c847fceb.description:
Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase.

Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fceb.name: Living Forge

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc2.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <font color='#FFFFFF'>Organic Deconstruction</font> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc2.name: Organic Deconstruction

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd07.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd07.name: Determination

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd7.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd7.name: Relentless Assault

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd03.description: <mainText>After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd03.name: Fury of the North

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc91.description: Morgana has Spell Vamp, healing herself whenever she deals damage with her spells.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc91.name: Soul Siphon

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce7.description: When Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce7.name: Holy Fervor

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb6.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb6.name: Icathian Surprise

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbd.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbd.name: Eternal Hunger

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcef.description: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcef.name: Traveler's Call

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca3.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca3.name: Soul Eater

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd13.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd13.name: Deadly Venom

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc99.description: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc99.name: Pix, Faerie Companion

5a13876a8bf55085c847fccc.description:
Zilean stores time as Experience.

When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fccc.name: Time in a Bottle

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfc.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfc.name: Loaded Dice

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc7.description:
Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage.

The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc7.name: Iron Ambassador

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc95.description: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc95.name: Get Excited!

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd8.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd8.name: Death Defied

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcce.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcce.name: Junkyard Titan

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd1.description: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd1.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc5.description: <mainText>Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.</mainText>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc5.name: Fury of the Dragonborn

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc6.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc6.name: Headshot

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce1.description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce1.name: Rage Gene

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd16.description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd16.name: Frost Shot

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce2.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce2.name: Reign of Anger

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd9.description: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd9.name: Spiked Shell

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcca.description: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcca.name: Adrenaline Rush

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf3.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf3.name: Illumination

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcea.description:
Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.

The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcea.name: Mark of the Storm

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbb.description: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbb.name: Hemorrhage

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf2.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf2.name: Noxious Slipstream

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcde.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcde.name: An Acquired Taste

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0b.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0b.name: League of Draven

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd09.description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd09.name: Z-Drive Resonance

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbf.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcbf.name: Spider Queen

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd4.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd4.name: Ki Barrier

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9a.description: Irelia reduces the duration of disables on herself based on whether she is Outnumbered by nearby champions. If she's in an even fight, she'll reduce disables by a small amount, if she's outnumbered, she'll reduce disables by a larger amount.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc9a.name: Ionian Fervor

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc98.description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc98.name: Voracity

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc0.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc0.name: Flurry

5a13876a8bf55085c847fce8.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fce8.name: Damnation

5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8d.description: Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fc8d.name: Prophet of an Elder God

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfe.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfe.name: Guerrilla Warfare

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf4.description: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcf4.name: Short Fuse

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0c.description: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd0c.name: Clockwork Windup

5a1387728bf55085c847fd31.description:
Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.

Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.
5a1387728bf55085c847fd31.name: Tailwind

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd10.description: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd10.name: Moonsilver Blade

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfa.description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.<rules>
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcfa.name: Cursed Touch

5a1387728bf55085c847fd30.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.
5a1387728bf55085c847fd30.name: Demon Shade

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd15.description: A percent of the damage dealt from abilities is converted into a temporary shield, absorbing incoming damage.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd15.name: Iron Man

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd06.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd06.name: Shurima's Legacy

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdc.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcdc.name: Stone Skin

5a13876a8bf55085c847fccd.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fccd.name: Bravado

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd6.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcd6.name: Phenomenal Evil Power

5a13876a8bf55085c847fca1.description:
Spells gain extra effects at max rank.

Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds.
Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%.
Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fca1.name: Transcendent

5a13876a8bf55085c847fd05.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fd05.name: Runic Blade

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb2.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcb2.name: Salvation

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcee.description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcee.name: Prowl

5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc1.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.
5a13876a8bf55085c847fcc1.name: Mana Surge

5a1384dc8bf55085c847b0c8.description: +1.17 mana per level (+21.06 at champion level 18)
5a1384dc8bf55085c847b0c8.name: Greater Mark of Scaling Mana

5a1384dc8bf55085c847b0ab.description: +0.54 health per level (+9.72 at champion level 18)
5a1384dc8bf55085c847b0ab.name: Greater Mark of Scaling Health
